message_1: A factory needs to produce 300 units of a product using 5 machines. Machine 1 produces 25 units per hour, machine 2 produces 30 units per hour, machine 3 produces 50 units per hour, machine 4 produces 60 units per hour, and machine 5 produces 70 units per hour. What should be the production plan (i.e., the number of hours each machine should operate) that minimizes the total production time?
